address: Level 7, 180 George St, SYDNEY, NSW, AUSTRALIA, 2000
summary: ASX-listed Zip Co Limited (ASX: ZIP) is a leading player in the digital retail finance and payments industry. The company offers point-of-sale credit and digital payment services to the retail, home, health, automotive and travel industries.
